errorPatterns.name: command_not_found
errorPatterns.context: This usually indicates a missing tool or PATH issue. Check installation steps and PATH configuration in the workflow file.

errorPatterns.name: permission_denied
errorPatterns.context: This indicates a permissions issue. Check file permissions, GitHub token permissions, or API access. Verify secrets and variables are correctly configured.

errorPatterns.name: syntax_error
errorPatterns.context: This indicates a syntax error in configuration files. Check YAML/JSON syntax, indentation, and ensure all required fields are present.

errorPatterns.name: timeout
errorPatterns.context: This indicates a timeout issue. Consider increasing timeout values in the workflow, optimizing long-running steps, or checking for infinite loops.
